lead_paragraph: SILLS--Ruth. July 24, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Irving, devoted mother of Robert (Carol Schwartz), Nancy (Franklin Moss) and of Judy, who predeceased her. Adoring and adored grandmother of Josh, Matt, Hannah, Becky and Joanna, and great-grand mother of Jackson, Harlow and Kendra. Services at the Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 91st and Amsterdam, on Thursday, July 28 at noon. 1/3
